detectors.description:
UFO.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UFO.sol#64-69) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UFO.sol#66)
detectors.markdown:
[UFO.transfer(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UFO.sol#L64-L69) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- [balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UFO.sol#L66)

detectors.description:
UFO.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UFO.sol#71-77) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[from] = safeSub(balances[from],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UFO.sol#72)
	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UFO.sol#74)

detectors.description:
UFO.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UFO.sol#46-48) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- _totalSupply - balances[address(0)] (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UFO.sol#47)

detectors.description: Variable UFO._totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UFO.sol#31) is not in mixedCase

UFO.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UFO.sol#36-44) uses literals with too many digits:
	- _totalSupply = 8888000000000000000000 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UFO.sol#40)

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- UFO.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UFO.sol#46-48)
	- ERC20Interface.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UFO.sol#4)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UFO.sol#5)
	- UFO.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UFO.sol#50-52)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UFO.sol#6)
	- UFO.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UFO.sol#54-56)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UFO.sol#7)
	- UFO.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UFO.sol#64-69)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UFO.sol#8)
	- UFO.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UFO.sol#58-62)

transferFrom(address,address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UFO.sol#9)
	- UFO.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UFO.sol#71-77)

safeMul(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SafeMath.safeMul(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UFO.sol#21)

safeDiv(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SafeMath.safeDiv(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UFO.sol#21-23)
